meanings.definition: A type of burrowing, limbless lizard with a cylindrical body and a head at each end.
meanings.sent1: The amphisbaenae slithered through the underground tunnels effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the behavior of amphisbaenae to learn more about their habitat.
meanings.sent3: The amphisbaenae decided to have a race with the earthworms for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like that of an amphisbaenae, always moving forward.
meanings.sent5: The children were fascinated by the peculiar appearance of the amphisbaenae.

meanings.definition: A mythical serpent with a head at each end.
meanings.sent1: Legends often speak of the powerful amphisbaenae guarding hidden treasures.
meanings.sent2: In ancient tales, heroes faced the fierce amphisbaenae in epic battles.
meanings.sent3: The amphisbaenae in the story had a great sense of humor, telling jokes with both heads.
meanings.sent4: The politician's deceitful nature was compared to that of the cunning amphisbaenae.
meanings.sent5: The artist's painting depicted the majestic amphisbaenae in all its mythical glory.
